name: Sapphire
description: A shiny blue sapphire, mined deep from within the earth.

name: Ruby
description: A marvelous red ruby, mined deep from within the earth.

name: Amethyst
description: A gorgeously purple amethyst, mined deep from within the earth.

name: Adamant Ore
description: I can smelt this into a bar.

name: Enhanced Iron Bar
description: An iron bar, enhanced with Withergate concrete and dark magic.

name: Enchanted Iron Bar
description: An iron bar, enchanted with Elven magic.

name: Adamant Bar
description: A bar of refined adamant, it's even stronger than iron.

name: Fabric
description: Not as soft as silk, but very durable.

name: Wood Beam
description: A solid beam of wood, usable in crafting. Beam me up!

name: Dead Log
description: The zombified log of a haunted tree, ready to be turned into planks.

name: Dead Hardwood
description: The zombified log of a haunted hardwood tree, ready to be turned into planks.

name: Dead Plank
description: Night of the living plank? Nah, just a deadwood plank. Used in Withergate crafting.

name: Dead Hardwood Plank
description: Night of the living plank? Nah, just a heavy deadwood plank. Used in Withergate crafting.

name: Sand Dollar
description: I wonder if this is what fish use as money?

name: Cat Nip
description: Cats usually keep this potent herb safely guarded, though they are known to drop some when excited.

name: Cinnaberry Jam
description: Spiced jam made from cinnaberries, fire crystals and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your combat and farming skills.

name: Shimmeroot Jam
description: Spiced jam made from shimmeroot, fire crystal and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your exploration skill.

name: Grape Jam
description: Sweet jam made from Elven grapes, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your mining skill.

name: Mana Gem Jam
description: Sparkling jam made from mana gems, water crystal and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your fishing skill.

name: Dragon Fruit Jam
description: Spicy jam made from dragonfruit, earth crystal and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your mining and fishing skills.

name: Tombmelon Jam
description: Tart jam made from tombmelon and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your farming skill.

name: Prickletot Pear Jam
description: Surprisingly sweet jam made from a young prickly pear and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your combat skill.

name: Pricklepop Pear Jam
description: Surprisingly sweet jam made from a mature prickly pear and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your exploration skill.

name: Attack Potion
description: An alchemic mixture that temporarily increases strength and attack power.

name: Speed Potion
description: A fizzing, shaking potion that threatens to wiggle right out of your hands. It temporarily increases speed and agility.

name: Defense Potion
description: A thick, syrupy potion that temporarily hardens the skin and increases defense.

name: Elixir of Fortitude
description: An elixir brewed from the shed scale of a mighty fire dragon, it will increase longevity when consumed.

name: Elixir of Mind
description: An elixir made of waters drawn from an enchanted pool found only in the lost Elven village of Nel'Vari, drinking it expands the mind and increases clarity.

name: Elixir of Speed
description: An elixir made from a rare and exotic berry, drinking too many of them may have... especially fast results.

name: Elixir of Arcane Might
description: An elixir distilled from the poison of a jungle plant, this potent tonic imparts magical prowess to its drinker.

name: Elixir of Ferocity
description: The juice of a Snakethorn cactus has been fermented into this potent elixir, increasing the drinker's strength and fury.

name: Elixir of Iron Will
description: An elixir brewed from the crushed stones of a legendary mountain, a small part of the unyielding mountain is imparted onto those who drink it.

name: Spiderweb Painting
description: A web of spider silk, depicted as a painting. Very goth, very spider.

name: Limited Edition Dynus Plushie
description: Only a handful of these limited edition plushies were ever created. Owing to their rarity, and Dynus's celebrity status, this is one of the hottest pieces of merchandise one could get their hands (or claws) on.

name: Cinnamon
description: This delicious dust adds a cool spice to your recipes.

name: Caramel
description: Sugar, heated up until it breaks down and reforms into heavenly caramel.

name: Chocolate
description: It's actually a complex process to render edible chocolate from chocoberries, but it's totally worth it.

name: Dough
description: D'oh!

name: Ice Cream Base
description: Prepared ice cream base, waiting to be mixed with anything you dare imagine.

name: Cupcake Mix
description: With some good flavoring, this cupcake mix can be baked into, well, cupcakes!

name: Pie Crust
description: The true quality of a pie is determined not by its filling, but by the flake of its crust.

name: Cake Mix
description: The basic ingredients required for a cake, what will you add to flavor it?

name: Banana Bread
description: Soft and springy, like a pillow. A bread pillow. Made with bananas.

name: Apple Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Blueberry Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Mushroom Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Hearty Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Strawberry Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Berry Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Cake Pop
description: A modern take on traditional cake, now you can take cake with you wherever you go!

name: Apple Cake
description: This definitely won't be keeping any doctors away.

name: Blueberry Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Orange Cream Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Strawberry Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Berry Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Black Forest Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Peach Cream Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Sugar Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Lemon Cake
description: You should always have cake on your birthday! In fact, maybe you should have a cake every day? You know, just to stay on the safe side.

name: Honeycomb Cake
description: No bees were harmed in the making of this cake.

name: Blue Rose Cake
description: A cake dramatically topped with a blue rose. The rose is entirely edible, if you're feeling frisky.

name: Cinnamon Cake
description: Heavily spiced with cinnamon, be careful not to eat it too quickly!

name: Creme Brulee
description: A baked custard dessert, torched with just a touch of fire magic. 'Creme Brulee' is a fancy way of saying it's slightly burnt!

name: Chocolate Pudding
description: There's proof in here somewhere.

name: Flan
description: Silky custard, best baked in a water bath to ensure proper texture.

name: Plain Tart
description: It's a little sweet, it's a little sour... it's tart!

name: Eclair
description: Basically a really fancy filled donut.

name: Souffle
description: In the old days, souffles were prone to deflating if disturbed. With a little mana, however, you can have the perfect souffle all the time!

name: Chocolate Tart
description: Technically a chocolate custard, though the bitterness of the chocolate lends itself to a tart flavor.

name: Raspberry Pie
description: A good pie starts with a good pie crust, and ends in your tummy!

name: Grape Juice
description: Originally cultivated by the Elves, grapes have a naturally high mana content. This gives their juice a helpful mana restoring effect.

name: Lemonade
description: When life gives you lemons, violently mash them and drink their juices - Demon proverb

name: Princess Pop
description: You can really taste the peachy pink! Its gives you a real energy boost.

name: Fizzy Fruit Fuel
description: Made with 60 grams of sugar and no fruit juice, a hit with kids all over.

name: Appetizing Ale
description: A gentle ale, drank to awaken one's appetite before dinner.

name: Bitter Beer
description: Brewed with strong hops and no sweetener, no wonder they call it bitter!

name: Buttery Beer
description: Beer and fresh cream, mixed together to create a milky, beer-y drink.

name: Tea
description: Essential for tea parties.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Best enjoyed on cold winter nights, but whenever else is fine, too.

name: Wine
description: Better to wine than to whine.

name: Advanced Earth Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of earth, significantly increasing your crop's harvest.

name: Advanced Fire Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of fire, significantly increasing the speed your crops grow.

name: Advanced Water Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of water, significantly increasing your crop's chance to stay watered over night.

name: Advanced Fish Bait
description: Bait made with quality ingredients, better than your standard fare.

name: Chilly Fishing Bait
description: It's like a popsicle for fish.

name: Spicy Fishing Bait
description: That's a spicy worm.

name: Really Spicy Fishing Bait
description: Just looking at this worm makes your eyes water.

name: Sweet Fish Bait
description: For the fish with a sweet tooth.

name: Lucky Fish Bait
description: It ain't the worm's lucky day, but it sure is yours!

name: Ruby Amulet
description: A beautifully carved ruby set on a golden chain, it increases vitality when worn.

name: Heart Amulet
description: A ruby heart has been set in this golden amulet, it increases vitality when worn.

name: Traveler's Silver Amulet
description: A silver amulet that has been passed down from one traveler to the next, fortune and vigor smile upon the one who possesses it.

name: Jam Maker
description: Everything you need to produce your own yummy jams, which grant bonus XP to your skills. Different flavors of jam grant bonus XP to different skills.

name: Firefly Jar
description: Light up the night with this jar of cute little fireflies.

name: White Table Lamp
description: A chic table lamp to light up your home.

name: Dreamy Painting
description: A thought provoking painting of an ethereal dreamscape.

name: Tree Oval Painting
description: The artist really captured the spirit of nature with this piece.

name: Sunny Day Small Painting
description: A picturesque scene of a delightfully sunny day.

name: Night Small Painting
description: A serene nighttime scene, looking at it for too long almost makes you a little sleepy.

name: Sunset Small Painting
description: The artist captured the colors of a deep sunset perfectly.

name: Black Cat Painting
description: Don't worry, a painting of a black cat isn't going to give you any bad luck.

name: Peaceful Waterfall Painting
description: You can almost hear the sound of gently rushing water when you look at this tranquil painting.

name: Elegant Vanity Painting
description: Framed in a beautiful flowing wood frame, this will make any room look extra fancy.

name: Wild Mushrooms Painting
description: The picture of chunky little fungi reproduced with colorful paints.

name: Swirly Night Painting
description: Colorful, swirling, surreal landscape.

name: Moody Flower Painting
description: Set in a thick frame, this piece radiates a truly unique energy.

name: Spooky Painting
description: An eerie landscape at sunset.

name: Organic Painting
description: Minimalist art of some kind of plant, very trendy.

name: Meatloaf Painting
description: It's beautiful.

name: Geode Painting
description: A must-have piece for any enthusiast of crystals and colors.

name: Wildflowers Painting
description: A very pretty painting of some rugged wildflowers that grow all over the Northern Region.

name: Boho Round Rug
description: A rug styled after the aesthetic of a frugal bohemian lifestyle.

name: Pet Water Bowl
description: Pets get thirsty, too!

name: Bunny Carrot Painting
description: A painting depicting an endless field of carrots, a bunny's dream.

name: Small Pony Painting
description: It must have taken a talented artist to paint such a detailed pony on such a small canvas.

name: Wooden Bench
description: Great for sitting outdoors, or perhaps for a unique alternative to your sitting room's standard couch!

name: Small Fishing Net
description: Automatically catches fish in the river, ponds and beach of your farm. Not the biggest, but it can still catch plenty of fish.

name: Glorite Bed
description: A bed constructed of Glorite, it's much softer than it looks.

name: Glorite Chair
description: Chiseled from solid Glorite, it feels more like a throne than a mere chair.

name: Glorite Table
description: A massive slab of polished Glorite, you could use this like a table.

name: Glorite Rug
description: Tiny crystals of Glorite are imbued in this rug, causing it to radiate a subtle warmth.

name: Glorite End Table
description: The top of this end table is impossibly smooth, yet nothing seems to slip over when set upon it.

name: Glorite Wardrobe
description: Massive Glorite crystals that have been hollowed out and fashioned into an impressive looking wardrobe.

name: Glorite Lamp
description: A small cluster of Glorite crystals, they emit a bright shine when touched.

name: Alchemy Table
description: A table equipped with all the tools one needs to brew their own potions. Potions grant temporary effects.

name: Cityscape Painting
description: An artist's recreation of the Withergate skyline, set against the darkness of eternal night.

name: Jeweler's Desk
description: A table equipped with all the tools you need to craft your own jewelry. Jewelry grants effects to its wearer.

name: Farmer's Table
description: A crafting table just for farmers! You can craft scarecrows, totems and even weapons made from farming items here.

name: Fire Fertilizer Totem
description: An enchanted totem imbued with the magical power... of fertilizer!

name: Watering Can Totem
description: An enchanted totem with a watering can attached to it. A simple but effective automatic watering device!

name: Royal Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Construction Table
description: A heavy duty construction table with all the tools needed for building houses and barns.

name: Painter's Easel
description:
Perfect for painting artwork to decorate your home with.

More expensive than buying artwork in a store, but the convenience is nice.

name: Seed Maker
description: A specialized extractor that can produce extra seeds from Sun Haven crops fed into it, multiplying your profits and letting you live off your own hard work!

name: Oven
description: More advanced than a basic cooking pot, turning the crops you grow into delicious cakes and desserts.

name: Sushi Table
description: A table specially designed for preparing sushi, a popular and exotic form of seafood from across the eastern sea.

name: Juicer
description: Squeeze fruit (or anything else you dare) into fresh juices. Juices provide restorative properties.

name: Keg
description:
A sealed keg, necessary for brewing bunches of bombastic beverages.
"Humans, Elves, Amari... yup, seems like every race invented their own brews." - Ronald

name: Small Aquarium
description: A silly little home for all the fish you've collected.

name: Nel'Vari Mana Infuser
description: An infusion crystal, capable of turning mana energy into convienent mana orbs.

name: Lettuce
description: A very mild flavor makes this vegetable excellent for pairing up with many different ingredients.

name: Eggplant
description: The skin of this peculiar plant resembles an eggshell, but it doesn't sound hollow. What does the inside taste like?

name: Soul Orb
description: A wispy sphere of pure energy, though it moves like a flame it is faintly chill to the touch.

name: Grapes
description: The unmatchable sweetness of these grapes more than makes up for the effort it takes to grow them.

name: Water Fruit
description: A soft sphere of water, the easiest way to consume this melon is to pop a straw right into it and drink away!

name: Fire Fruit
description: Flaming hot, they're hard to handle and even harder to eat, but very few fruits compare to the raging flavor of this berry.

name: Rock Fruit
description: Calling this fruit 'hard as rocks' would be an understatement. Don't chip a tooth!

name: Wind Chime
description: Some Elves in Nel'Vari claim they can play this wispy sprout as a sort of musical instrument.

name: Walk Choy
description: A crisp leaf dropped by a Walk Choy as a way of thanking you for helping it grow.

name: Shiiwalki Mushroom
description: A skinny mushroom stalk dropped by a Shiiwalki Mushroom as a way of thanking you for helping it grow.

name: Indiglow
description: Though a single lily gives off only faint glow, bundles of this flower are a popular decoration, and light source, for Nel'Varian homes.

name: Acorn
description: Bitter when raw but sweet and nutty once baked, a famous ingredient in Nel'Varian pies.

name: Cat Tail
description: Grassy stalks topped with a fuzzy brown 'tail' that no cat can resist the urge to pounce and paw at.

name: Mana Gem
description: Imbued with the mana of many different people, these beautiful gems glow with a soothing aura.

name: Pumpkin
description: Technically a fruit. A big, hard orange fruit.

name: Soda Pop Crop
description: The buds of this crop fizz with air, making it the most important ingredient in the four region's hottest new drink: soda!

name: Fizzy Fruit
description: This curious plant naturally creates fizzy air when brewed, fizzing up any drink they're used in.

name: Marshmallow Bean
description: Looks a bit like a bean, but tastes like a marshmallow. Name checks out.

name: Butternut
description: Better a squash than a smoosh.

name: Barley
description: The grain of this crop is high in fiber, but more importantly, it's useful in brewing!

name: Yam
description: Jam out with your yam out.

name: Lemon
description: Sour fruit, it can be tempered with sugar.

name: Clover
description: Do you think it's a lucky one?

name: Pineapple
description: Good for living in under the sea.

name: Coffee Bean
description: This bean turns into a magical drink when brewed in a keg.

name: Balloon Fruit
description: This wild fruit actually floats into the sky as a way of distributing its seeds.

name: Blue Moon Fruit
description: This fruit only grows once in a blue moon, but it is worth it for a taste of the night.

name: Hexagon Berry
description: Hexagons are nature's ultimate shape. Therefore, these are nature's ultimate berry.

name: Star Fruit
description: Sure to be the star of whatever dish you prepare it in.

name: Snow Ball Crop
description: These snowballs are not for throwing!

name: Blizzard Berry
description: These berries grow best when encased under the snow of fresh blizzards.

name: Kiwi Berry
description: A fruit native to a specific island within the Southern Islands chain.

name: Watermelon
description: Best enjoyed by the slice.

name: Honey Flower
description: Despite their name, they don't taste like honey - they just taste like  flowers. For a real honey taste, well, thats what you need the bees for.

name: Lavender
description: Legends say that this vibrant purple flower originally grew deep in Elven forests before adapting to the less magical soils of Sun Haven.

name: Hibiscus
description: People in the Southern Isles often wear these flowers in their hair for special occassions, a fashion choice that hasn't quite spread to the rest of the lands yet.

name: Sunflower
description: The official flower of Sun Haven, often used to represent one's appreciation of Elios the Sun Dragon. So, sun flowers in Sun Haven for the Sun Dragon.

name: Tulip
description: Tulips grow by the thousands in waving fields across the warmer parts of the Northern Region.

name: Small Mana Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Fishing Permit Tier 2
description: An official piece of paper permitting you to deploy a moderate number of fishing nets. Increase fishing net capacity by 4. Only one tier 2 fishing permit can be used per world.

name: Land Permit Tier 2
description: An official piece of paper permitting you to deploy a high number of crops. Increase crop capacity by 15. Only one tier 2 land permit can be used per world.

name: Medium Mana Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Seared Acorn Anchovy
description: Lightly oiled and seared on a hot grill, who needs a pan?

name: Seared Ironhead Sturgeon
description: Lightly oiled and seared on a hot grill, who needs a pan?

name: Seared Lobster
description: Lightly oiled and seared on a hot grill, who needs a pan?

name: Seared Pufferfish
description: Lightly oiled and seared on a hot grill, who needs a pan?

name: Seared Red Snapper
description: Lightly oiled and seared on a hot grill, who needs a pan?

name: Razor Stalk Tea
description: A delicious tea, though you have to take special care to strain all of the razorthorns out first.

name: Demon Coffee
description: Thick as mud and smelling just as awful, but Demons chug this stuff to start their day.

name: Demon Energy Juice
description: Withergate wasn't built in a day, but this energy concoction certainly sped development right along.

name: Demonsoul Latte
description: Brewed from the essence of demon orbs, the drink glows with a pale and eerie light.

name: Elemental Cocktail
description: The powers of earth, water and fire combine to form a cocktail with a delightful complex flavor profile.

name: Indiglow Tea
description: Light and sweet, the perfect pick-me-up drink to restore your inner glow.

name: Catsup
description: What's up, catsup?

name: Dragon Tea
description: With only the slightest hint of heat, this drink really does perk you up.

name: Mana Water
description: Pure water, imbued with radiating mana energy.

name: Fire Juice
description: It's juice, but it tastes more like drinking hot sauce!

name: Magical Water
description: Pairs perfect with magic beans.

name: Rocky Road Smoothie
description: Chunky and chilly, it's easy to see why this is Nel'Vari's favorite smoothie.

name: Acorn Milk
description: A bitter, nutty 'milk' alternative when you don't have any cows handy in your magical Elven forest.

name: Wind Chime Tea
description: Cool and airy, Nel'Varians love drinking this on hot summer days.

name: Spicy Catsup
description: Catsup's edgier older cousin.

name: Water Dragon Tea
description: Nel'Varians often drink dragon tea in honor of the natural elements.

name: Fire Dragon Tea
description: Nel'Varians often drink dragon tea in honor of the natural elements.

name: Earth Dragon Tea
description: Nel'Varians often drink dragon tea in honor of the natural elements.

name: Sandstone Sashimi
description: A bit hard to bite into, honestly.

name: Tuna Sashimi
description: Thinly sliced tuna, served nice and raw!

name: Pufferfish Sashimi
description: Thinly sliced pufferfish... a dangerous but delicious delicacy.

name: Cod Sashimi
description: Thinly sliced cod, served nice and raw!

name: Crab Roll
description: This crab is on a roll!

name: Tekka Maki
description: Red tuna, wrapped tightly in sticky rice.

name: Salmon Roll
description: Thinly sliced salmon, served nice and raw!

name: Swordfish Sashimi
description: Thinly sliced swordfish, served nice and raw!

name: Rainbow Roll
description: Two servings is called a double rainbow.

name: Red Snapper Sashimi
description: Thinly sliced red snapper, served nice and raw!

name: Tiger Roll
description: A generous portion of wasabi makes this tiger extra fierce!

name: Eel Roll
description: Eels are pretty easy to roll.

name: Lobster Sushi
description: Delicate lobster meat, lightly sauced and ready to meet your tummy.

name: Brisket
description: Caked in seasoning and slowly cooked over hot coals, brisket is every meat-lovers dream cuisine.

name: Root Beer
description: A drink originally brewed by the Elves, it was far too delicious to be kept a secret for very long.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Food fit for the goodest of boys.

name: Tavern Burger
description: How do tavern keepers make their burgers taste so good? What's their tavern-y secret?

name: Cobb Salad
description: With too many ingredients to count, this 'mere' salad is as hearty a meal as any.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Ask not for whom the bell pulls.

name: Pot Roast
description: Roasted until it's practically falling apart, total perfection.

name: Catch of the Day
description: "You catch it, I'll grill it. Don't care what it is." - Ronald

name: Supper Skillet
description: Potatoes, peppers, mushroom, cheese & eggs in a pan.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Eh, the chicken wasn't using those wings anyways.

name: Cheese Dip
description: The thing about Dip is that you can dip anything in it. The only limit is your imagination (and courage).

name: Scrambled Eggs
description: Perfect breakfast food before a morning exercise... or after a long night at the tavern.

name: Lemon Jam
description: Lemony tart jam made from freshly pulped lemon. Eating this will give you a boost to your farming skill.

name: Pineapple Jam
description: Sweet citrus jam made from freshly pulped pineapple. Eating this will give you a boost to your exploration skill.

name: Guava Jam
description: A tropical jam made from freshly pulped guava. Eating this will give you a boost to your mining skill.

name: Triangle Jam
description: Even math is delicious if you put enough sugar on it. Eating this will give you a boost to your combat and fishing skills.

name: Lettuce Seeds
description: Leafy and green, Lettuce absorbs moisture from the air and always stays watered overnight.

name: Eggplant Seeds
description: Is it an egg? Is it a plant? It's an eggplant! Or a plantegg? Plant it and find out!

name: Suckerstem Seeds
description: Sticky little seeds that some monsters enjoy munching on as a snack.

name: Water Fruit Seeds
description: Elementally imbued seeds that sprout into one of three different crops, you'll have to plant them and find out! Elemental Crops take 6 days to grow and each sells for a different base yield of 10, 16, or 20 mana orbs.

name: Fire Fruit Seeds
description: Elementally imbued seeds that sprout into one of three different crops, you'll have to plant them and find out! Elemental Crops take 6 days to grow and each sells for a different base yield of 10, 16, or 20 mana orbs.

name: Rock Fruit Seeds
description: Elementally imbued seeds that sprout into one of three different crops, you'll have to plant them and find out! Elemental Crops take 6 days to grow and each sells for a different base yield of 10, 16, or 20 mana orbs.

name: Walk Choy Seeds
description: Curious seeds that bounce about on their own accord, planting them is always a bit tricky.

name: Shiiwalki Mushroom Seeds
description: Hard spore clusters of some kind of strange mushroom, they wiggle a bit as you hold them.

name: Guava Berry Seeds
description: Guava is a popular tropical fruit in the Southern Isles, often turned into spicy jams.

name: Pumpkin Seeds
description: An important crop for any fall celebration!

name: Soda Pop Crop Seeds
description: They appear to be ordinary seeds, aside from the odd popping sound they emit.

name: Fizzy Fruit Seeds
description: They say these seeds fizz and bubble when planted. I wonder why...

name: Marshmallow Bean Seeds
description: Soft and pillowy little seeds, it's not hard to see where they get the name from.

name: Butternut Seeds
description: Butternut Squash seeds may look similar to pumpkin seeds, but they are actually just close cousins!

name: Barley Seeds
description: You can barley wait for these seeds to grow.

name: Yam Seeds
description: A tuber, like a potato, but naturally softer and more sweet.

name: Lemon Seeds
description: When life gives you lemon seeds, grow lemons.

name: Clover Seeds
description: Clovers don't have much value when sold, but growing them is an excellent way to gain experience.

name: Pineapple Seeds
description: These are super tiny seeds! When you eat a pineapple you likely don't notice the seeds you're eating at the same time!

name: Balloon Fruit Seeds
description: Careful, these seeds can be picked up and blown away by even the lightest breeze.

name: Blue Moon Fruit Seeds
description: Even the seeds are blue!

name: Hexagon Berry Seeds
description: Even the seeds of this berry are shaped like hexagons. Interesting.

name: Star Fruit Seeds
description: Did the name the stars after the fruit, or the fruit after the stars?

name: Snow Ball Seeds
description: Delicate white seeds that resembles small snow balls, and just as cold too.

name: Blizzard Berry Seeds
description: They're unusually sharp for seeds, which helps them grip into the soil of their icy habitat.

name: Kiwi Berry Seeds
description: Seeds of a berry grown in the warm climates of the Southern Isles. They're a little fuzzy, but in a cute way.

name: Green Bean Seeds
description: These beans will sprout into vines when planted, making even more green beans!

name: Watermelon Vine Seeds
description: Water you waiting for? Plant some watermelon!

name: Sugar Cane
description: It looks like an ordinary plant, but it's as sweet as sugar - literally!

name: Beet
description: You have to admit, these beets can't be beat (unless a recipe calls for it).

name: Purple Eggplant
description: Also known as an aubergine, though it's considerably less fun to say.

name: Honey Flower Seeds
description: A strange flower bud that grows, funnily enough, in the shape of a honey dipper. Hence the name.

name: Lavender Seeds
description: Strikingly purple, even by flower standards these are intensely colorful.

name: Hibiscus Seeds
description: A flower that is popular for the sweet and tropical fragrance of its blossom.

name: Sunflower Seeds
description: These flowers are famous for growing to impressive heights... they can easily end up growing taller than you!

name: Tulip Seeds
description: What has tulips, but no eyes or nose?

name: Elemental Seeds
description: Elementally imbued seeds that sprout into one of three different crops, you'll have to plant them and find out!

name: Sugar Cane Seeds
description: The seeds may not be very sweet, but just wait and see what they grow into!

name: Beet Seeds
description: Lumpy, irregular seeds. Are these really going to grow something?

name: Purple Eggplant Seeds
description: Despite the name, you're planting seeds - not eggs.

name: Rexxie
description: A tiny baby dinosaur, it was hatched from a dinosaur egg treated with a little chronomagic.

name: Walk Choy Pet
description: This happy little Walk Choy didn't feel like wandering away, he'd rather follow you!

name: Shiiwalki Mushroom Pet
description: Aw, this Shiiwalki Mushroom thinks you're a fun-guy and wants to follow you!

name: Brimmy
description: Imps are feral and bitey little critters, often following in the footsteps of Demons. They respect only the most powerful of pet keepers.

name: Webster
description: It is notoriously difficult to learn how to safely keep a Witherwidow as a pet, they are reserved only for the most accomplished pet owners.

name: Nevermore
description: Crows are very intelligent birds - they also hold a grudge, so mind yourself around this pet!

name: Noire
description: Demons long regarded themselves as the most cold and calculating beings in the universe... and then they met cats.

name: Fangy
description: Heatvipers weren't native to the swamps of Withergate, but when Demon King Aster learned of the species, he quickly arranged the import of hundreds of the ferocious creatures.

name: Pips
description: Fae spirits are incredibly elusive, revealing their physical forms only to those they feel they can truly trust.

name: Chipper
description: Squirrelbears are... well, they're kind of like squirrels... but they're also like bears... well, anyways - they're super cute!

name: Pinkadee
description: Forest rocs are behemoth birds, nearly as large as dragons. Except this one. She's just little, and pink.

name: Ursil
description: Children are often seen gazing up at the sky, hoping to catch a glimpse of the storied cloud bears as they waft across the blue heavens.

name: Sweetie
description: A chromatic salamander, found underneath the ends of rainbows.

name: Eel
description: I hope it's not the electric kind!

name: Angel Fish
description: Sometimes called a "doctorfish," like Wornhardt!

name: Pufferfish
description: Infamous for puffing into a spiky ball whenever threatened.

name: Carp
description: For a fish that spends all of its time eating algae it's surprisingly tasty.

name: Red Snapper
description: This fish can live for over 100 years, and grow to nearly 50 pounds!

name: Silver Carp
description: Glitters like real silver, but its nowhere near as valuable.

name: Blunted Swordfish
description: Not the sharpest fish in the sea.

name: Cuddlefish
description: Looks cute enough to cuddle, though doing so is not advised.

name: Ironhead Sturgeon
description: A head like iron and a body like fish.

name: Living Jelly
description: Pairs well with living peanut butter.

name: Slime Leech
description: Slimy to the touch, sometimes called "the Withergate mosquito."

name: Flamefish
description: Who needs laws of physics?

name: Purrmaid
description: A wild purrmaid! Watch out for the claws!

name: Dragon Gulper
description: A fierce predatory fish, its spiny fins are almost as sharp as its knife-like teeth.

name: Snobfish
description: Everything in nature is beautiful. Except the Snobfish.

name: Neapolitan Fish
description: It's said that this multicolored fish is fully pink right after hatching, and gains its colors as it grows.

name: Globfish
description: Globfish are great for cooking, because they don't have any bones! Just... glob.

name: Ghosthead Tuna
description: This tuna has a jelly-like transparent head, and two big eyes that act like flashlights. Perfectly adapted for where it lives, and perfectly weird to behold.

name: Tiger Trout
description: This fish uses its striped coloration to stalk between underwater reeds, much as a tiger does. Hence the name.

name: Tuna
description: So-called "chicken of the sea", but where are it's feathers?!

name: Lobster
description: A Sun Haven favorite, townies are especially fond of drenching these guys in plenty of fresh butter.

name: Holly Carp
description: Deck the halls with fish of holly, fa la la la...

name: Frozen Tuna
description: Not every fish deals with winter so well.

name: Heatfin
description: A beautiful flaming fish, its bright orange color sets it apart from your typical winter species.

name: Blazeel
description: Though native to the Magma Isles, this eel can be found as far north as Sun Haven when the weather is hot enough.

name: Magma Star
description: Far past the Southern Isles lay the Magma Isles, inhospitable to any life that can't tolerate a bit of molten lava... like this little starfish!

name: Molten Slug
description: Researchers would love to know more about the aquatic species that live in the Magma Isles, though traveling there is nearly impossible.

name: Flower Flounder
description: Researchers claim this fish's unique body structure helps it survive in the wild. Well, if they say so...

name: Sunfish
description: This grouper prefers to swim at the water's surface, allowing its shimmery scales to catch the light of the sun.

name: Raincloud Ray
description: A popular fisherman's myth is that this ray is easiest to catch during rainstorms.

name: Painted Egg
description: Can we offer you an egg in these trying times?

name: Pumpkin Jelly
description: Careful, its tentacles can leave a nasty sting... though it does go great in a pie.

name: Pirate Perch
description: Though this fish looks tough and grizzled, actually they argghhh quite tasty.

name: Apple Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful apple tree once planted.

name: Blueberry Tree Seeds
description: These tiny seeds will sprout into a bountiful blueberry tree once planted.

name: Island Breeze Painting
description: Looking into this painting you can nearly feel the warm tropical breeze of the Southern Isles.

name: Basic Wooden Chair
description: Basic in style, but not in quality.

name: Eastern Dragon Painting
description: A famous painting that originates from a land across the East Sea. This is just a reprint of the original, but it looks no less stunning.

name: Peach Painting
description: Fruit has always been a very popular subject for still-life paintings. This one is just peachy.

name: Red Barn Painting
description: A lovely painting of a big red barn, it's almost the perfect painting for a farmhouse.

name: Eastern Landscape Painting
description: A painting based loosely on an explorer's recounting of a village they visited, far across the East Sea.

name: Rose Painting Easel
description: A carved palette made for paints, an essential tool for any artist.

name: Rare Fish
description: Any rare fish
